name: Tic-Tac-Run
description:
Tic-Tac-Run is an endless runner. Avoid obstacles and try to survive as long as you can!

Apologies if something doesn't work. Especially the leaderboard is somewhat shaky.

Controls Keyboard
  • A, Left Arrow - move left
  • D, Right Arrow - move right
  • Space - jump
Gamepad
  • Left stick, D-pad - movement
  • Lower action button - jump
Software used
  • Unity3D - game engine
  • Blender - 3D models
  • Krita - painting
  • GIMP - painting
  • LMMS - music
  • Bfxr - sound effects
